plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and roots, but I'm not a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am smaller than a tree.
🌻 I might grow in your garden.
🪴 You can put me in a pot.

plant.question: I am green and leafy, and bunnies love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am often eaten in salads.
🐇 Rabbits enjoy me very much.
🥪 I can be put on a sandwich.

plant.question: I grow on trees and come in many colors like red, green, and yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White loved a poisoned one.
🥧 People make pies out of me
🌳 I need a tree to grow on.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside and a sweet inside. I grow in the desert. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I'm often found in dry, hot places.
🏜️ I store water inside me.
🦔 Be careful of my spines!

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated and am often enjoyed at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I need heat to transform.
🍿 I am often salty or sweet.
🌽 I come from a tall plant.

plant.question: I have a long stem and colorful petals. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I attract pollinators.
💐 People give me as a gift.
🌷 I come in many colors and shapes.

plant.question: I am a root vegetable that is orange and good for your eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me!
👁️ I am good for your eyesight.
🥕I grow underground.

plant.question: I am a tall tree with needles instead of leaves, and I stay green all year. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am often decorated during the holidays.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🌿 I have cones.

plant.question: I am a plant whose seeds are used to make chocolate. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My beans can be turned into sweets.
🌎 I grow in warm, tropical places.
🫘 My seeds are brown and bitter before they're processed.

plant.question: I am a vine that grows fuzzy fruit. Inside, I am green with tiny black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 My name is also the name of a bird.
🇨🇳 I originated in China.
💪 I'm a good source of Vitamin C.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I give Earth its light and keep it warm. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am a star.
🔥 I am very hot.
🌎 The Earth goes around me.

cosmos.question: I am round and rocky and I travel around the Sun. People live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I am your home.
💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 Plants and animals live here too.

cosmos.question: I am a light in the night, sometimes round, sometimes a crescent. I orbit the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves like me!
🌑 I have phases.
🧀 People sometimes say I am made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, and I'm another planet. Rovers explore me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My surface is the same color as this treat.
🚀 People are planning to visit me one day.
🔥 I am named after the Roman god of war.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. People use me to tell stories. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 One of me is a big bear.
✨ You can see me when you connect the dots.
📜 Ancient people named me after heroes and animals.

cosmos.question: I am very big, bigger than planets. I am made of gas and have many moons. I have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am the king of the planets.
🌪️ The spot is a giant storm!
🪐 I am mostly hydrogen and helium.

cosmos.question: I am a star that is very far away, so far that my light takes years to reach us. What am I?

hints.text: ♾️ Light travels very fast, but I am still far.
🔭 You need a powerful telescope to see me well.
💡 I can be much bigger and brighter than our sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. Our solar system lives in one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 Some of me are spiral-shaped.
🥛 Ours is called the Milky Way.
✨ I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a giant cloud of dust and gas in space where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful!
🌟 Stars come from me.
💨 I'm made of hydrogen, helium and other ionized gases.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that not even light can escape. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I am like a hole in space.
🌌 I can suck up everything around me.
⚫ I am created from collapsed stars.
